name: Testing & Verification of VLSI Circuits
description: ATPG algorithms, ROBDD, fault simulation, and formal verification techniques for digital circuits.

name: Advanced Machine Learning
description: Deep learning, NLP, computer vision, and reinforcement learning with hands-on projects.

name: Signals and Systems
description: Fourier analysis, Laplace transforms, and system modeling for continuous and discrete signals.

name: Introduction to Machine Learning
description: Supervised and unsupervised learning, neural networks, and practical ML applications.
